entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fort Smith
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Smith Airport 10:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
